document.full_text: about 16 flights were delayed friday morning when a carry-on bag screening machine at cleveland hopkins international airport malfunctioned and passengers had to be cleared out of the terminal and re-screened.
document.title: cleveland airport terminal evacuated after screening glitch
lines_and_colors: about 16 flights were delayed friday morning when a carry-on bag screening machine at cleveland hopkins international airport malfunctioned and passengers had to be cleared out of the terminal and re-screened.
